h1_title: How to Defeat the Stone Vanguard With Another Boss
h2_title: Where to Find the Stone Vanguard and Shigandang Boss
content: If you try interacting with it early, you'll find an inscription about how this rock is actually the Shigandang Yaoguai King Boss, sealed away with six items of divinity, which you can use to release him.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Defeat_the_Stone_Vanguard_With_Another_Boss.md', within the main section titled 'How to Defeat the Stone Vanguard With Another Boss', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Stone Vanguard and Shigandang Boss'.
The content is as follows:
If you try interacting with it early, you'll find an inscription about how this rock is actually the Shigandang Yaoguai King Boss, sealed away with six items of divinity, which you can use to release him.
